FAIL_TO_PASS: when showGlobalOptions:true and nested commands then combined nested options shown program last
when helpOption has custom description then helpInformation include custom description
when custom .version then helpInformation includes custom version help
when helpOption has just custom short flag then custom short flag invokes help
when showGlobalOptions:true then program options shown
when helpOption(true) after customise then helpInformation still customised
when default getOutHelpWidth then help helpWidth from stdout
when showGlobalOptions:true and no global options then global options header not shown
when helpOption(true) after false then helpInformation does include --help
when default .version then helpInformation includes default version help
when program has required option not specified and --help then help
when helpOption has just custom long flag then custom long flag invokes help
when showGlobalOptions:true and sortOptions: true then global options sorted
when helpOption has just flags then helpInformation includes default description
when program has required option not specified and subcommand --help then help
when addHelpOption with hidden help option then help does not include help option
when default configuration then global options hidden
when command has aliases then only first appears in help
when set program name then name appears in help
when addHelpOption has custom flags then custom long flag invokes help
